about_the_game:
Infinity Wanderer is an action platformer with pixel art visuals and a mix of metroidvania, roguelike and souls like genres. In Infinity Wanderer, players experience the dark and terrifying immersive story of Lunara. With carefully hand-designed levels and a deep character customization system, Infinity Wanderer offers a fluid and challenging rogue-like gameplay experience that combines fast gameplay mechanics with souls-like mechanics.

A Tough Challenge:

Infinity Wanderer invites players to challenge themselves with difficulties in both enemy design and level design. Infinity Wanderer combines elements of rogue like, Metroidvania and souls, giving players the opportunity to explore a rich world with pixel art visuals.

Infinity Wanderer Battle Mechanics;

Infinity Wanderer combines fast-paced gameplay with the combat mechanics of the souls games and has its own unique combat mechanics. Combining both traditional and new trends, Infinty Wanderer plans to give players a unique combat experience. However, you can experience the rogue like and souls like genres smoothly.

Smooth Gameplay:

Infinity Wanderer takes care to make all animations based on character movement as fluid as possible. Especially when doing parkour on platforms, it is very important for players to feel perfectly fluid. With different motion-based animations and options, players can diversify their gameplay and enjoy specially designed levels with smooth parkour elements. All the gameplay mechanics required for a 2D side scroller can be found in the rogue like genre of infinity wanderer with pixel art visuals.

Story:

Lunara, the graceful daughter of a farmer, was born in one of the darkest times on Earth, in a world of pain and death.

When the light of the full moon hanging in the sky softly pierced the darkness, Lunara opened her eyes for the first time. That same night, unfortunately, fate intervened and Lunara's mother took her last breath during childbirth.

At that moment, Lunara's father, feeling the weight of this tragic and unforgettable night in his heart, gave his daughter a name that bridged the gap between the bright light of the full moon and the depths of darkness: Lunara! This name symbolized both her destiny and the noble light of the sky.

When Lunara was born, the world was in the grip of deep chaos; the plague was sweeping across civilization, taking the lives of men and shrouding the world in a gloomy cloud of sorrow.

It was an plague so brutal that as a child, Lunara was forced to witness her father die in front of her eyes. Although her soul was deeply scarred by this cruel beginning that fate had given her, there was a fire that burned in Lunara's heart: The will to survive and fight. This fire grew within her, strengthened and transformed her into a warrior.

In her young years, in a world where war was inevitable, Lunara joined the army. She was not yet a veteran soldier, but despite her weaknesses, her inner strength sustained her. In the wake of the pandemic that wiped out the large majority of men, women around the world banded together to survive and protect their lands. As part of this unit, Lunara witnessed the strength and resilience of women. With their own hands, they defended the lands where men once ruled on the battlefields.

But the world was threatened not only by the shadow of the plague, but by the violence and evil spirits rising from the dark corners of the east. These evil beings, fueled by the disease, grew in strength and descended upon all of humanity like a nightmare.

One night, the people of Sylvors, covered in a cold blanket of snow, were suddenly struck by a terrifying attack. The sound of bells tearing through the sky mingled with the screams of people groaning in agony. Lunara, like all soldiers, reached for her sword and rushed out of the darkness, charging at the enemy. This was a battle not only of weapons, but also of gods. Each blow deepened the wounds in Lunara's soul, but also made her stronger.

For long hours Lunara fought the enemy relentlessly, but the cruel hand of fate denied her victory this time. Lunara collapsed from the deadly blow of the enemy. Lying in the snow, Lunara's blood slowly soaked into the earth as her eyes began to close and she felt the cold death approaching her. As Lunara breathed her last breath, the fire of life within her was about to die out. However, her spirit, refusing to leave this world quietly, reached the gods.

The gods saw Lunara's stubborn spirit and decided to give her another chance. It was not only an opportunity for her, but also an entertainment for the gods. Lunara was imprisoned in a realm where the most savage monsters, corrupt spirits and the dark fears of humanity took shape. Whether she could escape this world would determine whether she would be given new life.

On this dangerous journey, Lunara must face not only the creatures she encounters, but also the deepest nightmares that once haunted the minds of every living being. Each step would crush her spirit a little more, but each time she would rise again, strengthened by the pain. To become an invincible warrior and a legend, she would have to accept defeat and take up the fight again and again, wearing her pain like armor.

It was not only a fight for her life, but also a struggle to come to terms with the dark sides of her soul. While the gods expected her to emerge victorious from this struggle, Lunara had only one goal: To return to life and escape this dark world. But along the way, she would discover who she was and her true power.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II x2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Infinity Wanderer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II x2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or AMD Phenom II x4 945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Infinity Wanderer is a roguelite, souls-lite action-platformer. Players dive into Lunara's dark story, facing her fears in a nightmare world. With handcrafted levels and deep character customization, it offers fluid, challenging combat that blends fast-paced and strategic souls-like mechanics.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Swedish, Albanian, Bosnian, Estonian, Persian, Georgian, Croatian, Slovak, Serbian, Hebrew
*languages with full audio support
